projectPurpose: To provide a Rust library for reading and writing Unreal Engine save files (GVAS), facilitating programmatic interaction for developers and modders.
mainFeatures: Rust library for reading and writing Unreal Engine save files (GVAS)
Supports a wide range of object structures
Includes a CLI utility for converting saves to/from JSON format

alternatives.name: UeSaveGame
mainFeatures: .NET library for UE4 and UE5 save files

alternatives.name: UESaveEditor
mainFeatures: WIP graphical save editor for non-encrypted saves
Allows browsing and editing save data

alternatives.name: pyUE4Parse
mainFeatures: Python library for parsing UE4/5 asset files

alternatives.name: Save Editor Online
mainFeatures: Online save editor for various game formats
Supports .sav files for Unreal Engine games

marketPositioning: uesave-rs is an open-source library written in Rust specifically targeting developers and modders who need programmatic access to Unreal Engine save files (GVAS). Its position is distinct from graphical save editors by providing a library for building custom tools and integrations within the Rust ecosystem. Compared to libraries in other languages, it leverages Rust's performance and safety features. The included JSON conversion utility makes it a versatile tool for both automated processing and human-assisted editing workflows.
